messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

In a golang-nuts thread, user wanted to set ClientAuth:
tls.RequireAnyClientCert, which seems reasonable.

But it's also reasonable for him to copy/paste the code elsewhere.

On Mon, Feb 20, 2012 at 5:24 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Why?
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7a899d8d9e4e ***

net/http: add optional Server.TLSConfig field

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5688047

subject: code review 5688047: net/http: add optional Server.TLSConfig field
